articles.title: LIV Golf League to expand to 14 tournaments with $405 million in total purses in 2023
articles.description: LIV Golf, which debuted with eight tournaments in the LIV Golf Invitational Series this year, said it is expanding to 14 tournaments in 2023 and raising purses from $255 million to $405 million.
